projects.title: Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: Interactive web application that visualizes popular sorting and searching algorithms in real-time. Built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS for an engaging learning experience.
features: Multiple sorting algorithms (Bubble, Merge, Quick, Heap)
Interactive controls for speed and array size

projects.title: DSA Resume Tracker
projects.description: Full-stack application to track Data Structures and Algorithms practice progress. Features user authentication, progress analytics, and personalized recommendations.
